UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the PoultryMitra application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

poultryMitraId.description: A user-facing, unique, and indexable ID (e.g., PM-FARM-ABC12).

role.description: Role of the user (farmer, dealer, admin).

state.description: The state where the user resides.

district.description: The district where the user resides.

uniqueDealerCode.description: A unique code assigned to dealers for farmers to connect with.

connectedFarmers.description: A list of farmer UIDs connected to this dealer.

connectedDealers.description: A list of dealer UIDs this farmer is connected to.

dateJoined.description: The date and time the user joined.

capacity.description: Maximum capacity of the farm (number of birds).

SubscriptionPlan.title: SubscriptionPlan
SubscriptionPlan.description: Represents a subscription plan with different features.

id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription plan.

name.description: Name of the subscription plan (e.g., Basic, Premium).

features.description: List of features included in the subscription plan.

FarmData.title: FarmData
FarmData.description: Represents farm data collected over time.

id.description: Unique identifier for the farm data entry.

productionRate.description: Production rate of the farm (e.g., eggs per day).

FarmAlert.title: FarmAlert
FarmAlert.description: Represents a critical or warning alert for a farm.

message.description: A descriptive message for the alert.

isRead.description: Whether the alert has been read by the user.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order between a dealer and a farmer.

orderDate.description: Date when the order was placed.

items.description: List of items in the order.

status.description: Status of the order (e.g., pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered).

Supplier.title: Supplier
Supplier.description: Represents a supplier from whom a dealer purchases goods.

dealerUID.description: The UID of the dealer this supplier belongs to.

Diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
Diagnosis.description: Stores a saved AI health diagnosis report.

input.description: The input given to the AI.

output.description: The structured output from the AI.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability. User profiles are stored in a top-level `users` collection. The admin role is now determined by a direct check of the user's email in the security rules, which is simpler and more robust than relying on a separate collection. Farm data, including sensor readings, is nested under the `farms` collection to link it to a specific farm. An `alerts` subcollection is under `farms` to manage real-time alerts efficiently. The `orders` collection stores order details, including `farmerId` and `dealerId`. The `suppliers` collection stores dealer-specific supplier information, with security rules ensuring that only the owner dealer can manage their own suppliers. A new `diagnoses` collection is added to store saved health reports for sharing.
